cbioportalR 0.1.0
  • Reference
  • Changelog

    Get information about available studies in a cBioPortal instance

    get_studies.Rd

    Get information about available studies in a cBioPortal instance

    get_studies(study_id = NULL)

    Arguments

    study_id

    Character vector of one single study ID (e.g. "mskimpact") or NULL. Default is NULL which returns all available studies. Currently multiple study ids are not supported.

    Value

    A tibble of study meta data

    Examples

    get_cbioportal_db("public")
get_studies()
#> Warning: No CBIOPORTAL_TOKEN in `.Renviron`. Try `usethis::edit_r_environ()` to add a token
